display_long_description:
Monko Bongo
Monko Bongo is a chill, immersive adventure game currently in development by the creators of Realistic Gorilla. Set in a mysterious, peaceful cave environment, the game invites players to explore at their own pace, relax, and take in the sights and sounds of the world around them. Whether you’re casually wandering through tranquil chambers or soaking in the atmosphere, Monko Bongo offers a soothing, laid-back experience.

But when you’re ready for a bit of excitement, you can switch to Tag mode, a fast-paced game mode where you can chase or be chased in a thrilling race around the cave. It’s the perfect blend of relaxation and fun, letting you choose when to unwind and when to get your heart pumping.

Developed by the team behind Realistic Gorilla, Monko Bongo brings the same love for detail and unique gameplay to create an experience that’s both calming and engaging. While still in development, we can’t wait for you to dive in and enjoy the peaceful exploration or get your competitive spirit going with Tag. Your feedback is crucial as we continue to shape this world, and we hope you’ll love what we’ve created so far!
